price: Esse será o verdadeiro dia. Então, quem quiser, tomará retorno a seu Senhor.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
